dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3290 IH: National Museum of Pop Culture Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Jayapal (for herself, Mr. Newhouse, Mr. Baumgartner, Ms. DelBene, Mr. Larsen of Washington, Ms. Randall, Ms. Schrier, Mr. Smith of Washington, and Ms. Strickland) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To designate the Museum of Pop Culture in Seattle, Washington, as the National Museum of Pop Culture.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the National Museum of Pop Culture Act.

section.header: Designation of national museum of pop culture in seattle, washington

subsection.text: The Museum of Pop Culture located in Seattle, Washington, is designated as the National Museum of Pop Culture.

The National Museum of Pop Culture designated by subsection (a) is not a unit of the National Park System and the designation shall not be construed to require or permit Federal funds to be expended for any purpose related to the museum.
